channel.title: BlazeScape
channel.description:
I have decided to make a new thread because off all the flaming and arguments happening, (With my help) [IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll245/mjownzu_07/bannerfans_2885501.jpg[/img] Well anyway,
Welcome To BlazeScape! After getting permission from Blaze (Zac) I have been allowed to re-make the amazing game BlazeScape, (But with some originality)
I can't be arsed to post pictures, so ive made a video, you can find it here - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vGBo-47SA_c
Post at constructive critism you have, but please try and stay on topic, thanks.
~Johno

item.title: BlazeScape
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

The Soul:

I love how `Rich removed all of the spam on your topic already.

And theres not going to be any more, so please stay on topic.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 01:07:06 pm[/size][hr][quote=“cocoa, post:5, topic:292738”][quote author=johno2 link=topic=386780.msg2897671#msg2897671 date=1249321250]

Well anyway,

Welcome To BlazeScape! After getting permission from Blaze (Zac) I have been allowed to re-make the amazing game BlazeScape, (But with some originality)

Post at constructive critism you have, but please try and stay on topic, thanks.

~Johno
[/quote]

Wait, Blazefire’s name is Zac? and he spells it just like mine? conspiracy…[/quote]

Cocoa, read my post on hillz forums please

item.title: BlazeScape
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Ok, first things first, im not using U-Rune, how many times do i have to say it, second thing, keep all cocoa related BS stuff on his thread not mine. Im Using a completly different source alltogerther, defaultscape V2. (But i have cleaned + finished off the skills and removed A LOT of bugs)
